title: Events
description: A list of media and book-related events.
contents:
Book launch
The book will be released on October 1, 2021 by NewSouth Books
First, Do No Harm: The Perils of Too Much Medicine and How We Can Tackle It
A compelling on-line session open to the public, patients, and health professionals, featuring the authors of Hippocrasy and Dr Ranjana Srivastava, author, cancer doctor and Guardian columnist.
Time: Monday October 11, 9am - 11 am Limited places, but register for this Free interactive meeting here

title: Welcome to 'Hippocrasy etc.'
description: Welcome to **Hippocrasy etc.**, a blog that provides information about, and supplemental to the book: *Hippocrasy, how doctors are betraying their oath*.
contents:
Blog post #1
We are excited to announce that Hippocrasy will be release by NewSouth Books on October 1, 2021. Stay tuned for events around that time - we will update them in the Events page
